annualPropertyTaxes.title: Annual Property Taxes
annualPropertyTaxes.description: Annual property tax amount tenant pays

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: Date when the lease term expires

leasedSquareFootage.title: Leased Square Footage
leasedSquareFootage.description: Total rentable square footage covered by this lease

leaseId.title: Lease ID
leaseId.description: ID of existing lease record to update (leave blank to create new lease)

monthlyBaseRent.title: Monthly Base Rent
monthlyBaseRent.description: Base monthly rental amount before additional charges

premises.title: Premises
premises.description: Specific portion of the property (e.g., Suite 300, Floor 2)

propertyId.title: Property ID
propertyId.description: ID of the Property record (required for new leases)

renewalNoticeDays.title: Renewal Notice Days
renewalNoticeDays.description: Number of days advance notice required for renewal

renewalOption.title: Renewal Option
renewalOption.description: Whether tenant has the right to renew this lease

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date when the lease term begins

status.title: Status
status.description: Current status of the lease (Active, Pending Renewal, Expired, Terminated)

structure.title: Lease Structure
structure.description: Type of lease structure (e.g., Triple Net Lease (NNN), Gross Lease)
